svg.title: ST-13: Strategic Testing Coverage Heatmap Analyzer
svg.desc: Interactive testing dashboard that analyzes coverage data across entire codebase, highlights critical gaps, provides risk-based testing priorities, and tracks testing effectiveness over time with drill-down capabilities.
svg.text: Interactive coverage analysis with risk-based prioritization and strategic testing recommendations

g.text: 💡 Click modules to drill down to file/function level
Critical Gaps: 3 modules | High Priority: 2 modules | Target: 85%
• Authentication Module: Increase from 18% to 85% coverage (Critical business risk)
• Security Layer: Comprehensive edge case testing, penetration test scenarios
• Resource Allocation: 2 senior engineers, AI-assisted test generation, 8 eng-days
• Jest for unit testing with AI edge case generation
• Integration Services: Target 75% coverage with contract testing and service virtualization
• API Layer: Comprehensive endpoint testing, schema validation, rate limiting scenarios
• AI-powered API test creation from OpenAPI specs
• Load testing scenarios for critical API endpoints
• CI/CD integration with coverage gate validation
• Knowledge sharing on testing best practices
• Target: 85% overall coverage with 95%+ critical path coverage
• 60% reduction in production defects, 340% testing ROI
